Package com.carrentalsystem.controller

Class LeaseService

java.lang.Object
com.carrentalsystem.controller.LeaseService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILeaseService
public class LeaseService extends Object implements ILeaseService
The LeaseService class provides methods to interact with the lease repository and perform operations related to leases in the car rental system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LeaseService()
    Constructs a new LeaseService object with the default lease repository implementation.

  • Method Details

    • createLease

      public void createLease(int leaseID, int vehicleID, int customerID, Date startDate, Date endDate, String type, String state)
      Creates a new lease in the system.
      Specified by:
      createLease in interface ILeaseService
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease
      vehicleID - The ID of the vehicle leased
      customerID - The ID of the customer leasing the vehicle
      startDate - The start date of the lease
      endDate - The end date of the lease
      type - The type of lease (e.g., daily, monthly)
      state - The state of the lease (e.g., active, expired)

    • returnCar

      public List<Lease> returnCar(int leaseID) throws LeaseNotFoundException
      Returns a leased car and completes the lease.
      Specified by:
      returnCar in interface ILeaseService
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease to return
      Returns:
      A list of leases containing the returned lease
      Throws:
      LeaseNotFoundException - if the lease with the specified ID is not found
